nodes.excerpt: See who viewed your content instantly. Along with total view count, you can also see the total percentage viewed by users on screen recordings, videos, and images. These analytics will allow you to focus on creating content with higher engagement
nodes.title: Analytics from CloudApp - See who’s watching and engaging with your content
nodes.author: Scott Smith

localize.description: 即时查看谁浏览了你的内容。除了总浏览次数，你还可以看到用户对屏幕录像、视频和图片的总浏览百分比。这些分析可以让你专注于创建具有更高参与度的内容。
localize.tagline: 查看谁在观看和参与你的内容。

localize.description: 即時查看誰瀏覽了你的內容。除了總瀏覽次數，你還可以看到用戶對屏幕錄像、視頻和圖片的總瀏覽百分比。這些分析可以讓你專注於創建具有更高參與度的內容。
localize.tagline: 查看誰在觀看和參與你的內容。

nodes.excerpt: Deepfake videos online are growing exponentially. How to verify if you are watching a fake video? AI-generated social profiles are now ubiquitous. How to make sure that your last LinkedIn connection is not a fake person? Analyze them with Sensity.
nodes.title: Sensity - The deepfake detection platform
nodes.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 网上的深层假视频正在成倍增长。如何验证你看的是否是假视频？AI生成的社交资料现在已经无处不在。如何确定你最后的LinkedIn连接不是一个假人？用Sensity来分析它们。
localize.tagline: 深度造假检测平台

localize.description: 網上的深層假視頻正在成倍增長。如何驗證你看的是否是假視頻？AI生成的社交資料現在已經無處不在。如何確定你最後的LinkedIn連接不是一個假人？用Sensity來分析它們。
localize.tagline: 深度造假檢測平臺

nodes.title:
At $7.56 trillion, the Fed's Balance Sheet hit another new high this week.

The Fed's total assets have increased $3.4 trillion over the last year and they have promised to keep buying bonds at a rate of $120 billion per month. https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
7.56万亿美元，本周美联储资产负债表再创新高。

美联储的总资产在过去一年中增加了3.4万亿美元，他们承诺将继续以每月1200亿美元的速度购买债券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。

7.56萬億美元，本週美聯儲資產負債表再創新高。

美聯儲的總資產在過去一年中增加了3.4萬億美元，他們承諾將繼續以每月1200億美元的速度購買債券。https://t.co/BZnuED1CHd。

nodes.excerpt: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML…)
nodes.title: Roboflow Annotate - Annotate images with ease. Export to any format.
nodes.author: Michael 😍 Galpert

localize.description: 给图像贴标签是做好计算机视觉模型的关键。Roboflow Annotate使您能够轻松地对图像进行标注，并且模型辅助标注可以为您的图像进行第一次标注！Roboflow Annotate可以为您提供任何格式的输出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以导出为任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 轻松注释图像。导出为任何格式。

localize.description: 給圖像貼標籤是做好計算機視覺模型的關鍵。Roboflow Annotate使您能夠輕鬆地對圖像進行標註，並且模型輔助標註可以爲您的圖像進行第一次標註！Roboflow Annotate可以爲您提供任何格式的輸出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以導出爲任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆註釋圖像。導出爲任何格式。

nodes.excerpt: Runops is a command-line app that lets you query databases and manage servers using a single tool. It adds Git versioning, reviews in Slack, and sensitive data masking to every command you run from the terminal.
nodes.title: Runops - Run one-off scripts as production-ready automations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Runops是一款命令行应用，让你可以用一个工具查询数据库和管理服务器。它为你从终端运行的每一条命令增加了Git版本管理、Slack中的审查和敏感数据屏蔽功能。
localize.tagline: 将一次性脚本作为生产就绪的自动程序运行

localize.description: Runops是一款命令行應用，讓你可以用一個工具查詢數據庫和管理服務器。它爲你從終端運行的每一條命令增加了Git版本管理、Slack中的審查和敏感數據屏蔽功能。
localize.tagline: 將一次性腳本作爲生產就緒的自動程序運行

nodes.excerpt: Pulse is a private, 27,000+ verified member community for technology leaders to learn from their peers. Members can ask questions, create polls, and engage in conversations for instant insights. Over 16,000+ new data points are gathered each week in Pulse.
